page.title: 15Government.
page.content: The Mayor's Committee and local Clubs etc.look after entertainment in the town,our Community Council,Preseli District Council and Dyfed County Council and the National Park don't do anything like that. But these Councils can shout a lot for us and get things done.This year we have had a T.V.Booster station,better street lighting,new railings for thr Cemetry,better road surface and more because the Council asks for it. The Nat.Park has drawn a Plan for Newport in the future (and they can be nasty and tell you to build your house from stones!). We have many new places in town,new surgery,telephone exchange,bus station,bank,library and more.Our school is very old and is falling down,I don't think the Councils really care.
